canonicalization.attr_map: MUST be empty in canonical GAIA payloads until all encoders enforce lexicographic key ordering.
canonicalization.ids: schema_id/context_id are hex sha3-256 digests (Path A fixtures).

schema_bundle.note: Path A uses fixture IDs (HG_AVRO_v1/HG_JSONLD_v1). Path B will derive content-addressed IDs from canonical Avro+JSON-LD outputs.

unary.method_notes: Method names may include extra argument suffixes for fixtures; op is authoritative inside HGRequest.op.
